survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Electric Bicycle Rentals
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have used electric bicycle rental services to assess their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall experience of renting an electric bicycle?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and consistency. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall experience of renting an electric bicycle?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which features of the electric bicycle did you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all relevant features. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.

script.question_text: Which features of the electric bicycle did you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the electric bicycle rental service?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the electric bicycle rental service?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use the electric bicycle rental service again in the future?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood. This helps gauge customer retention potential.
